CHAT.comment: The beginning of the activity seems to have been cut off due to tape recorder difficulties. The recording begins , though , with Mot telling Chi about a part that she liked in the story , which Chi writes about in the letter. Chi then writes a sentence on her own , and Mot dictates the next. Chi signs it on her own , including both her name and her mother's. Mot's toddler nephew is in the background playing and making a lot of noise , distracting Mot from time to time.

u.a: talks to EX2 about the tape recorder and whether it is working correctly .
talks to EX2 about the tape recorder
continues to talk about the tape recorder and switching the batteries
the tape recorder is turned off and then back on . EXP is still adjusting the tape recorder . Mot and Chi have begun the letter writing process .
MOT talks to her nephew who is whining
MOT pauses before answering Chi . there is a lot of background noise at this point
bef Mot and Chi are whispering something ?
MOT is busy with her nephew
